channel.title: Monster doesn't attack [PI]
channel.description: Alright well I've got a monster that doesn't attack, and you can't attack it if you add it through spawn-config.cfg. But if you spawn in using ::npc 2554, it works just fine. The monster is K'ril Tsutsaroth, its ID is 2554. If anyone could go about telling me how to make this monster available for combat, that'd be great. Sorry if this in the wrong section, I don't know where the problem lies.

item.title: Monster doesn't attack [PI]
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Alright well I’ve got a monster that doesn’t attack, and you can’t attack it if you add it through spawn-config.cfg. But if you spawn in using ::npc 2554, it works just fine. The monster is K’ril Tsutsaroth, its ID is 2554. If anyone could go about telling me how to make this monster available for combat, that’d be great. Sorry if this in the wrong section, I don’t know where the problem lies.

Read full topic
